I’m incredibly excited to announce that I’ll be speaking at this year’s **Windows Server Summit 2025**, a [free online event](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/event/windowsserver-events/modernize-server-management-and-connectivity-with-azure-arc/4397253) for all to join on April 29-30, 2025. This is a fantastic opportunity for anyone passionate about server management, connectivity, and the future of technology to learn and connect.

In my session, **“[Modernize server management and connectivity with Azure Arc](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/event/windowsserver-events/modernize-server-management-and-connectivity-with-azure-arc/4397253)”** I’ll be joined by the brilliant **Aurnov Chattopadhyay**, Azure Arc Product Manager, to explore the latest in server modernization. Together, we’ll dive into how you can connect **Windows Servers across hybrid, multicloud, and edge environments** to Azure.

As a Program Manager for the [Azure Adaptive Cloud](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/tag/azure-adaptive-cloud/), I focus on technologies that bridge diverse environments, including **Azure Arc** and **Azure Local**. Our session will showcase:

- **Connectivity options** to empower your Windows Servers.
- **Attestation to Windows Server Management**, ensuring reliability and security.
- **Azure capabilities for SCCM modernization**, highlighting how Azure can transform your server management strategies.

[![Modernize server management and connectivity with Azure Arc](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/event/windowsserver-events/modernize-server-management-and-connectivity-with-azure-arc/4397253)Modernize server management and connectivity with Azure Arc

The Windows Server Summit is more than just a summit—it’s a moment to celebrate innovation, embrace learning, and engage with a global community of IT professionals. Whether you’re just beginning your journey or are a seasoned expert, this event has something valuable for everyone.

Mark your calendars and [join us online](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/event/windowsserver-events/modernize-server-management-and-connectivity-with-azure-arc/4397253) for the Windows Server Summit 2025! I look forward to sharing insights, answering your questions, and helping you unlock new possibilities with Azure Arc. Let’s modernize together!
